rules_text: Tavern Brawl deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: [i]Kreg Stoutbeard frequently recalls the famous Tavern Brawl, claiming that during the fight he was the “perfect dwarf” — an ax in one hand to maul his enemies, and a mug of ale in the other to take a drink for every enemy he mauled.[/i]
